lead_paragraph: At Indian Wells, Novak Djokovic lost a set before defeating the American qualifier Bjorn Fratangelo, and Serena Williams struggled in a straight-set victory over Yulia Putintseva.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Bjorn Fratangelo in first round of BNP Paribas Open; Serena Williams defeats Yulia Putintseva to advance to women's fourth round.
snippet: At Indian Wells, Novak Djokovic lost a set before defeating the American qualifier Bjorn Fratangelo, and Serena Williams struggled in a straight-set victory over Yulia Putintseva....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams Rebuff Challenges
